name: Giant Snow Beetle
description: The Giant Snow Beetle is a large beetle covered in icy blue and white patterns, capable of rolling sizable snowballs and utilizing its snowy surroundings for camouflage.
memorable: Its ability to hide even when clearly visible and its poisonous snowball attacks make it a unique threat in cold environments.
goals: To ambush prey and defend its territory in snowy regions.
relations: May be encountered alongside other cold-dwelling beasts or in frigid areas.
environment: Cold environments, often in snowy areas where it can blend in with the landscape.
strengths: Strong physical attacks combined with stealth capabilities and environmental manipulation.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, making it less effective in social interactions.
attacks: Pincer attack deals bludgeoning damage, while snowball attacks can cause damage, knockdown effects, and poison.
most_powerful_ability: Rotten Snowball Shove allows it to poison and damage multiple targets simultaneously.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 30 feet, enhancing its detection of nearby creatures.
skills: Proficient in athletics and stealth, making it a formidable ambusher.
additional_information: Can create snowballs for various attacks
